title: Eador.Masters.of.The.Broken.World.MULTi5-PROPHET
description:
Eador: Masters of the Broken World (c) Snowbird Games     
                                                                  
         release date ...: April 2767                             
         protection .....: Steam                                  
         # of discs .....: 1                                      
         languages ......: EN/DE/ES/PL/RU                         
         ---------------------------------------------------      
                                                                  
         Eador is a universe made  of  countless  shards  of      
         land drifting in the Great  Nothing.  Each  of  the      
         shards  is  a  little  world  unto   itself,   with      
         geography and denizens of its own. The  power  over      
         the shards is bitterly contested  by  Masters,  the      
         immortal beings mortals believe to  be  gods.  Take      
         the role of the mighty Master and shape the destiny      
         of Eador! It is in your power to deliver the  world      
         from ultimate destruction ÃƒÂ» or to choke it with  an      
         iron fist of tyranny. Eador: Masters of the  Broken      
         World is a turn-based fantasy strategy game,  where      
         the decisions you make affect the world even deeper      
         than the battles you win.                                
   
         1- Unpack, burn or mount                                 
         2- Install the game                                     
         3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir                       
         4- Go To Hell!                                           
                                                                  
         NOTE:                                                    
         If you have played this game before and it  doesn't      
         launch  with  the  language  selected  during   the      
         installation,  go  to  DocumentsEador  folder  and      
         delete  the  resource.lib  file.  Game  version  is      
         v1.3.1.
